attributes.action: Allow small Wedding Ceremonies in England Tier 4
attributes.additional_details:
Couples are having to cancel or postpone so many times its heartbreaking. 
A simple, small and socially distanced ceremony should easily be achievable.
attributes.background: Allow small Wedding ceremonies to go ahead even in lockdown like shown in Scotland and Wales.

rejection.details: Under the national restrictions that come into force today weddings can take place in all areas, but only with up to 6 people: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home#weddings-civil-partnerships-religious-services-and-funerals
